title: Longformer with reduce_output="cls_pooled" fails with tuple index out of range
body:
Also, `transformer_outputs.pooler_output` is None.  

Reduce modes which use a SequenceReducer on the hidden state, like `reduce_output: sum` do work.

Stack trace:

```
Training for 42800 step(s), approximately 200 epoch(s).
Starting with step 0, epoch: 0
Training:   0%|                                                                                                      | 0/42800 [00:00<?, ?it/s]Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\Daniel\github\email-experiments\examples\supervised\train_spam_assassin.py", line 40, in <module>
    train_stats, _, _ = model.train(
  File "C:\Users\Daniel\.conda\envs\ludwig39-dev\lib\site-packages\ludwig\api.py", line 528, in train
    train_stats = trainer.train(
  File "C:\Users\Daniel\.conda\envs\ludwig39-dev\lib\site-packages\ludwig\models\trainer.py", line 877, in train
    should_break = self._train_loop(
  File "C:\Users\Daniel\.conda\envs\ludwig39-dev\lib\site-packages\ludwig\models\trainer.py", line 1007, in _train_loop
    loss, all_losses = self.train_step(
  File "C:\Users\Daniel\.conda\envs\ludwig39-dev\lib\site-packages\ludwig\models\trainer.py", line 311, in train_step
    model_outputs = self.model((inputs, targets))
  File "C:\Users\Daniel\.conda\envs\ludwig39-dev\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\module.py", line 1110, in _call_impl
    return forward_call(*input, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Users\Daniel\.conda\envs\ludwig39-dev\lib\site-packages\ludwig\models\ecd.py", line 147, in forward
    encoder_output = encoder(input_values)
  File "C:\Users\Daniel\.conda\envs\ludwig39-dev\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\module.py", line 1110, in _call_impl
    return forward_call(*input, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Users\Daniel\.conda\envs\ludwig39-dev\lib\site-packages\ludwig\features\text_feature.py", line 287, in forward
    encoder_output = self.encoder_obj(inputs_exp, mask=inputs_mask)
  File "C:\Users\Daniel\.conda\envs\ludwig39-dev\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\module.py", line 1110, in _call_impl
    return forward_call(*input, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Users\Daniel\.conda\envs\ludwig39-dev\lib\site-packages\ludwig\encoders\text_encoders.py", line 1880, in forward
    hidden = transformer_outputs[1]
  File "C:\Users\Daniel\.conda\envs\ludwig39-dev\lib\site-packages\transformers\file_utils.py", line 2329, in __getitem__
    return self.to_tuple()[k]
IndexError: tuple index out of range
Training:   0%|
```
